 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכֹל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁכַל‎</span> [[BDB#Lag|Lag]]<sup>BN 26</sup>] **verb** ==be bereaved== (= Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּכוֺל‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּכֵל‎</span>; compare Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***loss of children***); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּאֲשֶׁר שָׁכֹלְתִּי שָׁכָ֑לְתִּי‎</span> [[Gen.43.14|Gen 43:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***if I am bereaved, I am bereaved*** (of father, expressing resignation; on <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָ֑לְ‎</span> see [[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:29u»§ 29u</sup>); ***Imperfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶשְׁכַּל‎</span> [[Gen.27.45|Gen 27:45]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), with accusative of person ***be bereaved*** of you both (of mother); 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּשְׁכַּל מִנָּשִׁים אִמֶּ֑ךָ‎</span> [[1Sam.15.33|1Sam 15:33]] ***thy mother shall be bereaved above*** (more than) ***women***. **Pi\`el** ***Perfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁכְּלָה‎</span> [[1Sam.15.33|1Sam 15:33]] +, suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשִׁכְּלָ֑תָּה‎</span> [[Ezek.14.15|Ezek 14:15]], etc.; ***Imperfect*** 3 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׁכֵּל‎</span> [[Deut.32.25|Deut 32:25]] +, 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תְּשַׁכְּלִי‎</span> [[Ezek.36.14|Ezek 36:14]] [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּשַׁל‎</span> **Pi\`el**); ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְשַׁכְּלָם‎</span> v[[Ezek.36.12|Ezek 36:12]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁכֵּלָה‎</span> [[Exod.23.26|Exod 23:26]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֶּ֫לֶת‎</span>- [[Ezek.36.13|Ezek 36:13]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּ֫לֶת‎</span>- — [[2Kgs.2.19|2Kgs 2:19]]; [[2Kgs.2.21|2Kgs 2:21]] — 

**1.** ***make childless***, accusative of father [[Gen.42.36|Gen 42:36]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), of mothers [[1Sam.15.33|1Sam 15:33]] (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span>), compare [[Ezek.5.17|Ezek 5:17]] (subject famine and beasts), and [[Ezek.14.15|Ezek 14:15]] (***id.***; object land); accusative of people [[Hos.9.12|Hos 9:12]] (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵאָדָם‎</span>), [[Jer.15.7|Jer 15:7]] (+ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִבַּתְִּי‎</span>), [[Ezek.36.12|Ezek 36:12]], compare v[[Ezek.36.13|Ezek 36:13]] v[[Ezek.36.14|Ezek 36:14]] (see above); object omitted (subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חֶרֶב‎</span>) [[Deut.22.25|Deut 22:25]]; [[Lam.1.20|Lam 1:20]]; [[Ezek.21.19|Ezek 21:19]] ([[BDB#Co|Co]], for <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּכָּפֵל‎</span>, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּפַל‎</span>; otherwise Toy [[BDB#Krae|Krae]]). 

**2. a.** ***cause barrenness***, or abortion, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָאָרֶץ מְשַׁכְּ‎</span> [[2Kgs.2.19|2Kgs 2:19]], compare v[[2Kgs.2.21|2Kgs 2:21]] ([[BDB#Thes|Thes]] otherwise, see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשׁ‎</span> infra). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***shew barrenness***, or ***abortion***, (1) of any female [[Exod.23.26|Exod 23:26]] ([[BDB#E|E]]; + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עֲקָרָה‎</span>), animals [[Gen.31.38|Gen 31:38]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) [[Job.21.10|Job 21:10]] (2) of vine [[Mal.3.11|Mal 3:11]]. **Hiph\`il** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶהֶם‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְשָׁדַיִם צֹמְקִים‎</span>) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׁכִּיל‎</span> [[Hos.9.14|Hos 9:14]] ***miscarrying womb***. — [[Jer.50.9|Jer 50:9]] read <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַשְׂכִּיל‎</span> ***successful***, [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] Heb Manuscripts [[BDB#Ew|Ew]] [[BDB#Hi|Hi]] [[BDB#Gf|Gf]] [[BDB#Gie|Gie]]. 



 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְשַׁכֶּ֫לֶת‎</span> according to. [[BDB#Thes|Thes]] **noun feminine abstract** ==barrenness==, [[2Kgs.2.21|2Kgs 2:21]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מָוֶת‎</span>); if so, read &lt; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֹּלֶת‎</span>- [[BDB#Klo|Klo]] [[BDB#Kit|Kit]]; but probably **Pi\`el** ***Participle*** as v[[2Kgs.2.19|2Kgs 2:19]], compare [[BDB#Bur|Bur]].
